channel.title: Troubleshooting on The Skeletor Project
channel.description: Recent content in Troubleshooting on The Skeletor Project

item.title: External svgs
item.description:
External svgs don’t work across domains.

They have to be on the same domain.

Workarounds

Embed the sprite at the top of the page.

item.title: Flexbox
item.description:
There are 3 different versions of flexbox. Skeletor can detect and adds a body class if flexbox is supported.

display: -webkit-box;      /* OLD - iOS 6-, Safari 3.1-6 */
display: -moz-box;         /* OLD - Firefox 19- (buggy but mostly works) */
display: -ms-flexbox;      /* TWEENER - IE 10 */
display: -webkit-flex;     /* NEW - Chrome */
display: flex;             /* NEW, Spec - Opera 12.1, Firefox 20+ */
